rules_text:
Signature – Lady of Air, Lady of Earth, Lady of Fire, Lady of Water [i](Put your chosen signature into your hand from outside the game when you control two of its named cards.)[/i]
As long as you have a full sentai, Captain Aether gets +10/+10 and has lifelink, hexproof, trample, and haste. [i](A sentai is up to one creature of each color.)[/i]
